column5: Imagine that, snow in Dec, Jan. The stores must have had an over stock off snow removal stuff and called the media to announce BIG Panic THE SKY IS FALLING  . Woke up this morning to see 2 Feet and all I see is green grass  . I hope it snows like that all winter.
I think that the Weather man on the News should be paid only if his prediction is right.  It's friggin December!!!!
Two big lightning/thunder here amidst all the snow.  I was shovelling the drive but that one lightning bolt was too close for comfort.  My driveway is only halfway done.
THERES A BLIZARD IN OTTAWA RIGHT NOW weve got atleast 5 cm since i got up
what storm?  only problem are the dummies on the roads
Some serious snow coming down now...still horizontal though. I've finished all the paperwork I can do at home..guess it's time to hit the road, hopefully not the ditch.
heavy wet snow/rain  -1 in guelph
National Emergency yet??  Is Toronto completely snowed in?  Maybe the army can start brining in supplies while the going is still good......sheesh!!
No snow in Nanaimo yet  Heading up to Campbell River today.  Clear day today.
Left Hamilton at 7:30 this morning, rainy and slushy roads.  Travelled up HWY 6 towards Guelph and rain turned to snow.  9am here in Kitchener is snowy, wet and sloppy.  Drive carefully Crew!
Yeah, tell them to start with University Ave. AKA the parade route.

here in the sault its bit of a blizzard. we got around a foot of snow and its just a blowing out there right now. the radio says the school buses arent going out today. i got the day off with pay  might pull out of the sled hahaha!
Nuthin but rain since 3am.  Got me a drip along the seem of the main house and the back addition
Sorry, the storm has moved in pretty good here in Lindsay, not more than 30mins after i typed out my forcast.  Lot''s of snow, maybe 10" in some spots....drift's are everywhere also

It's all good here in Yellowknife!!!  We only got a trace of snow last night. The bad comes tonight as the temp dips down to -41 with highs over the next couple of days in the -34 to -36 range!!! All coupled with 20 to 25 kmh winds for some nasty windchills in the -50 to -60 range!!!!! BRRRRRRRRRRRR!!!!!! On the bright side we're makin' some ice!!!!!!!
Trying to find my snowshoes so I can get out to the shop... but I think they're in the hangar with my ice fishing stuff. Guess I'll just have to sit here by the fire instead...

got off today boss phoned me this mornning cancelled he job .  was supposed to go 2 houres in the back woods...  last year we got stuck in the first storm like this one.  lesson lived.. lesson learnt.  now i can go in the garage and play with my ice fishing stuff.!
All schools are cancelled here today ...its plus 4 sunny and quite nice out ...
Here in Burlington we had abut 2+ inches of snow. Had a house fire near me on Dundas which has horse stables in it. Made for a hetic morning for the people following Dundas. hehe
Sunshine in Barrie

We got about 6" of very wet snow.. drifts around trucks and buildings are/were over 1.5 feet. Took 2 hours to plow that crap vs the usual 45 minutes... but I found my snowshoes!! lol  Temp has jumped to 3C... making things SLICK. Now clouding over for part two... supposed to get as much as 35 cm here tonight and tomorrow. Guess I should go work on moving my wood pile in while I still can!

Its now pooring rain here. What a mess. We've got about 6-8" of wet, nasty stuff on the ground. I wish I had of  covered my boat. It took longer to clear it out, than it did the driveway!! She's ready to go for the morning though!  S.
Here in Nipigon its - 12  snowing and blowing with wind gust up to 33kmph Nasty so i decided to clean up the bait shop So if I'm cleaning up what am i doing on the computer Hmmm
Amixed bag in the hammer,Aliitle nicer in aldershot sunny and warmer when I got there  ,then came the rain.  A good day for skie fishing I think.

Well, we goy our 8" of blowing snow overnight and most of the day. Went to the mall with the wife tonight and all but a few side streets (mine) are plowed. It looks quite nice. Supposed to get another 8 the next day or so. Temp is a comfy -6 so no worry about rain. Looks like winter is settling in nicely.  Another log on the fire and I'm set for the night.  Oh yeah..son was just finishing shoveling as I pulled into the driveway after work...seems he couldn't get the blower to start..thats in the shop thawing now.
Hows the conditions in your area?
all clear in KW so far...
Nothing here.  S
It's coming.. on Windsor to Chatham right now.  http://www.theweathernetwork.com/weather/m...qlink_obs_radar  Won't effect my commute to work..
I have the shovel in the boat already  S.
freezing rain here now...crap
nothing up here yet...wind is picking up though
It is supposed to be a non event in London
It's starting to snow pretty good in Hamilton now.  Clarence
snowing and blowing at Downsview  jjcanoe
It's 3:00 AM and snowing here in East York now and windy too, but I think were only sposed to get a few inches here in town.  1st snow we've seen this year down here.
snowin and raining between Brantford and Oakville .. make sure you have you windsheild washer topped up .. your gonna need it
snowing/blowing in Bradford
Its snowy and blowing around pretty good up here ( Collingwood area )  I was hoping to see a bit more snow, I still might have to go to work
If you look hard there is some hiding between the blades of grass and in the cracks of the sidewalk here, bit of rain now. Looks like the weatherman had another case of premature accumulation
a few inches here in central toronto still blowing.
The winds have started and some light snow is starting to blow in Sudbury.

Just in case you have any doubts chek out these two sites.  http://www.intellicast.com/National/Radar/...mp;animate=true  http://www.weatheroffice.gc.ca/radar/index_e.html?id=WKR   The animations (loop) are nice.  muddler
Good one.

We haven't any snow here yet but the radar screen shows it starting anytime. School boards have closed here. I think we'll be seeing a really good batch of useless/unreliable employees in the next while.
We got about 2" so far I would say, sounds windy out but that's it for now...
I'm disappointed. Nothing here in Hamilton short of a few flakes on the grass.  I had big plans of watching the GF run the snowblower for the first time.
Snow this morning.listening to the high wins and sleet off the hotel window,and listening to the back up beepers on the plows since 5am. Now I have to drive to AYR.

So far it's more of a wind storm here north of Peterborough, whatever snow is falling is falling horizontal, no real accumulation to speak of...  I was hoping to try out my new snowblower but the little bit on my deck & driveway could be swept away with a broom.

Blizzard conditions here in West Nipissing...  I need a shovel to dig out my shovels.    on the bright side the lakes are freezing up....  3/4" for over 200 yards on Cache Bay {Nipissing} yesterday    Have  a GREAT day and remember to do some stretching exercises before swinging that shovel
